unnormalised: He, pura pata do ṭhikage ohon'me, jemone Flat no. 201, Sai Enclave, Apollo Hospital laha re, Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad, Telangana, 500033. Nahale, aam do dak' jogaw do bilamok'a, bhai.
normalised:
ᱦᱟᱸ, ᱯᱩᱨᱟᱹ-ᱯᱩᱨᱤ ᱴᱷᱤᱠᱟᱹᱱᱟᱹ ᱱᱤᱫᱟᱹᱜ ᱢᱮᱱ ᱞᱟᱜᱟᱣ-ᱟ, ᱡᱮᱢᱚᱱ Flat number ᱫᱩᱭ ᱥᱟᱭ ᱢᱤᱫ, Sai Enclave, Apollo Hospital ᱞᱟᱜᱟ, Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad, Telangana, ᱯᱟᱸᱭ ᱞᱟᱠᱷ ᱛᱤᱥ ᱯᱮ ᱜᱮᱞ᱾
ᱱᱚᱦᱚᱸᱢ ᱵᱟᱝᱠᱷᱟᱱ, ᱟᱢ-ᱟᱜ ᱯᱮᱠᱮᱴ ᱵᱤᱞᱟᱹᱢ-ᱟᱜ-ᱟᱜ ᱥᱟᱶᱵᱷᱟᱣᱱᱟᱹ ᱢᱮᱱᱟᱜ-ᱟ, ᱵᱷᱟᱹᱭ᱾
text: He, pura pata do ṭhikage ohon'me, jemone Flat no. 201, Sai Enclave, Apollo Hospital laha re, Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad, Telangana, 500033. Nahale, aam do dak' jogaw do bilamok'a, bhai.
